name: What is a fossa?
description:
Are you a young Twaching-speaking yotavuș? Do you have a lot of interest for Earth animals and want to practice your English? Then this is the game for you! Featuring cute art, fun music, and two playmodes depending on your level of English, this game is just what you're looking for! Learn about the biological history of the Earth animal the fossa, and brush up on your English translation while you're at it, right here, right now!

This is a game made for my college BIO 206 class in 4 days, start to finish.  It discusses the phylogeny of the fossa, along with the other animals related to it on the island of Madagascar. Twaching is a conlang of mine, and a minor one at that, attached to a fictional culture on a planet far, far away from Earth.
